title: Detox & Environmental Medicine - Seattle Integrative Medicine
cleaned_text: Good. Detox & Environmental Medicine In today's world, it's important to be aware of potential environmental exposures and toxins, and to take steps to minimize them. When they linger and deposit in long-term stores within our bones or organs, toxins can perpetuate inflammation, imbalance hormones, and contribute to progression of chronic illnesses. Whether it be molds and mycotoxins, heavy metals, or chemical exposures, we offer sophisticated, evidence-based testing, to screen for and diagnose toxins. If you have a specific goal or exposure, or if you're looking for a more general approach, we can help you learn how to support the detoxification process and promote overall health.
